description: BR-32 is the District Transport Office for Madhubani, situated in the culturally rich Mithila region of Bihar. The office manages vehicle registration, driving licenses, and transport permit services for a district bordered by Nepal, facilitating vital cross-border and regional transit. It serves as a primary regulatory body within the Darbhanga division, supporting major commercial hubs like Jainagar and Jhanjharpur.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Madhubani, Bihar
